title: Nether.Resurrected-PROPHET
description:
Nether: Resurrected (c) Nether Productions, LLC
release date: August 2769
protection: Steam
# of discs: 1
languages: EN/RU

Nether is a fast-paced survival game that forces
you to make quick life-saving decisions in an
unforgiving environment. In this post-apocalyptic
urban world, death is waiting around every corner
at the top of high-rise buildings, and in the grasp
of powerful teleporting creatures known as
'Nethers'. These creatures and the other players
are real challenges to overcome, requiring tactical
gameplay, awareness, stealth, and cooperation. To
navigate this high-tension environment, you must
use skill and cunning in order to scavenge, trade
craft or loot for food, weapons, supplies, and
other resources necessary to stay alive in a
desolate and dangerous city. Team up with other
survivors and take advantage of group play, as a
tribe, to complete treacherous world objectives, or
play as a lone wolf in an attempt to endure the
hostile environment. In the end you must decide
whether to Prey or Pray

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
Single Player mode is fully functional - after the
game launches wait a moment and "connect" to Single
Player server to play (works offline)
